section.title: Examples
section.para: The sample application provided for Diameter Sh (Client) supports two scenarios:

formalpara.title: Application requests user data
formalpara.para: In this scenario, the application sends a request to the remote peer (the Home Subscriber Server). The application then requests data for a single user.

formalpara.title: Application subscribes to profiles changes
formalpara.para: In this scenario, the application subscribes to the Home Subscriber Server (HSS) to monitor changes to a user profile. Once the subscription is established, the example service receives .
